src.file.player
Class PlayerFile

java.lang.Object
  src.file.player.PlayerFile

public class PlayerFile
extends java.lang.Object

The file representation of a Player. This is similar to a hybrid between MapFile and MapData. It is a singleton, just like MapFile.

See Also:
MapFile, MapData

Field Detail

PROGRAM

public static final int PROGRAM
The "Program" code for all NitsLoch file formats. In a big-endian file, this is equivalent to ASCII 'NITS'.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

FORMAT

public static final int FORMAT
The "Format" code for the Player format (as opposed to a Map file or other future additions). In a big-endian file, this is equivalent to ASCII 'PLA2'. PLA2 is the second version of the Player file format; PLAY is the first version.

See Also:
